name: My First Alphabet Game
description:
A game designed for preschool and kindergarten aged children to learn the letters through verbal, image and tactile learning. It includes the ability for the parents to track their child and their progress they have made through a stats screen. 

The child will see a picture, hear the letter and the word to describe the image with heavy emphasis on the letter that starts the word. There are four levels of difficulty.

Level 1 - Single Button interface used for toddlers to increase their letter recognition by seeing an image, hearing the sound and clicking on the letter.

Level 2 - provides two options, one correct and wrong.

Level 3 - provides an increased difficulty with four buttons of which only one is correct.

Level 4 - The most challenging difficulty intended for kindergarten aged children and includes the keyboard with which they have to type the correct letter instead of selecting from a limited set. 

Parents can view a single advertisement before letting their child use the app to remove all ads for free for the entire session.
